scenarios.title: Vendor Access
scenarios.description: A third‑party platform will store PHI for scheduling.
scenarios.question: What must be in place before sharing PHI?
scenarios.explanation: BAAs are required for business associates handling PHI.

scenarios.title: Minimum Necessary
scenarios.description: A staff member requests full record access ‘just in case’.
scenarios.question: What is the correct response?

options.B: Grant access limited to job duties (minimum necessary)

scenarios.explanation: Access should be limited to the minimum necessary.
